item.title: Tank stats
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows the tanks with the highest Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier I Heavy Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 7.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Heavy Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Update 7.0
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 7.0. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 135M battles recorded by 403k players.

item.title: Update 7.0 stats and tank-type pages added
item.description: Added stats for update 7.0. Interestingly, the player base tracked played far less battles during the update compared to the previous update despite the update interval being very long due to the WG release schedule.
